1:
Once upon a time, Man was walking in the bush. 
Suddenly, he met Lion!
2: Lion was resting in the short grass.
3:
The meeting was so
sudden that Man
did not know what to
do. 
He was full of fear.
4:
At first, Lion was
surprised too, and a
little afraid. 
But there was a low rumble in his stomach, because he was hungry.
5:
Man suddenly
found himself up a tall
tree. 
He began to shout at Lion.
6:
Lion lay down
under the tree, waiting
for his meal. 
As time went on, Lion fell asleep, or so it
seemed.
7:
Soon Man fell asleep. 
Then he woke up again. Finally he dozed off and went fast asleep.
8:
But then he crashed
down on the sleeping Lion!
9:
They both woke up confused and frightened. 
Lion forgot his meal and ran for his life.
10:
Man began to run
in the same direction
as Lion. 
Then he realized that he was running behind Lion!
11:
So he changed direction and escaped. 
He was not eaten by Lion!
